name: weak-armor
caption: Weak Armor

effect.short: Raises [Speed]{mechanic:speed} and lowers [Defense]{mechanic:defense} by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.
effect.full:
Whenever a physical move hits this Pokémon, its [Speed]{mechanic:speed} rises one stage and its [Defense]{mechanic:defense} falls one stage.

This ability triggers on every hit of a multiple-hit move.

flavorText:
Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense
stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
